message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. However, $12,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go as high as $6,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $10,000.  This is my final offer.
